faqs.question: How do I sign up?
faqs.answer: Open the app and tap on 'Create Account'. You can register using your mobile number or email.

faqs.question: Can I use the app on Android and iOS?
faqs.answer: Yes! Easy Fix is available on both Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Tap on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: How do I update my profile?
faqs.answer: Go to Profile > Edit and update your name, phone number, or profile picture.

faqs.question: How do I book a service?
faqs.answer: Choose a service from the home screen, enter your details, and tap 'Book Now'.

faqs.question: Can I cancel a booking?
faqs.answer: Yes, go to My Bookings > Tap on the booking > Cancel.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We support UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and wallet payments.

faqs.question: How do I request a refund?
faqs.answer: Go to the booking details screen and click on 'Request Refund'.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via in-app chat or email at support@fixg.com.
